rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
癌症研究人员敦促拥抱人工智能以获得突破性的见解和效率《自然评论癌症》中的一篇评论强调癌症研究人员有必要了解人工智能的潜力和局限性，详细介绍其在癌症研究中的应用和挑战，以帮助非计算生物学家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Cancer-researchers-urged-to-embrace-AI-for-groundwriting-insights-and-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Cancer-researchers-urged-to-embrace-AI-for-groundwriting-insights-and-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69606157-5774-4386-a231-3ec09d3c804a Mon, 20 May 2024 00:08:00 -0400 Cancer researchers urged to embrace AI for groundbreaking insights and efficiency
研究称，体脂百分比在预测肥胖相关健康风险方面优于体重指数《临床内分泌与代谢杂志》上的一项研究发现，体脂百分比 (%BF) 阈值在预测与肥胖相关的健康状况方面比 BMI 更准确，这为定义超重和肥胖提出了新标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Body-fat-percentage-beats-BMI-in-predicting-obesity-lated-health-risks-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Body-fat-percentage-beats-BMI-in-predicting-obesity-lated-health-risks-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dc6bf86-8c80-48be-a50e-9bfa1a7aa577 Sun, 19 May 2024 23:22:00 -0400 Body fat percentage beats BMI in predicting obesity-related health risks, study says
蟒蛇养殖会成为可持续畜牧生产的下一个重大事件吗？ 《科学报告》中的一项研究表明，蟒蛇养殖可能是一种可持续且高效的牲畜替代品，显示出可观的增长率和商业用途的高生产效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Could-python-farming-be-the-next-big-thing-in-sustainable-livestock-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Could-python-farming-be-the-next-big-thing-in-sustainable-livestock-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=798a1a86-a044-4a4c-8a79-a1a832603d04 Sun, 19 May 2024 22:54:00 -0400 Could python farming be the next big thing in sustainable livestock production?
新研究确定了早期检测胰腺癌的关键蛋白质生物标志物研究使用孟德尔随机化方法将 REG1A 和 REG1B 确定为早期检测胰腺癌的潜在生物标志物，显示它们的因果效应和在癌症筛查中的意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/New-study-identizes-key- Protein-biomarkers-for-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/New-study-identizes-key- Protein-biomarkers-for-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36bc4087-3e96-4fee-a35c-c73d99079227 Sun, 19 May 2024 22:38:00 -0400 New study identifies key protein biomarkers for early detection of pancreatic cancer
基于网络的自助计划被证明可以有效治疗暴食症研究表明，基于网络的认知行为自助干预措施可以有效减少暴食症（BED）患者的暴食事件并改善整体健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Web-based-self-help-program-proves- effective-in-treating-binge-eating-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Web-based-self-help-program-proves- effective-in-treating-binge-eating-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c654fe85-e1af-4e1f-9ece-d2f570a03a77 Sun, 19 May 2024 22:03:00 -0400 Web-based self-help program proves effective in treating binge eating disorder
英国学校的压力研讨会显着改善青少年的心理健康《柳叶刀》上的 BESST 研究发现，与标准治疗相比，针对英国青少年压力的简短认知行为治疗研讨会在六个月后显示出临床和成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Stress-workshop-in-UK-schools-significantly-improves-mental-health-of-teenagers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Stress-workshop-in-UK-schools-significantly-improves-mental-health-of-teenagers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2be1a6b2-7884-4f34-9c4f-436549751582 Sun, 19 May 2024 21:49:00 -0400 Stress workshop in UK schools significantly improves mental health of teenagers
研究显示六个国家母亲产后抑郁症的发病率惊人发表在 BMC Public Health 上的研究确定了六个国家母亲产后抑郁症 (PPD) 的患病率、预测因素和应对策略，强调了不同文化和人口背景之间的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-postpartum-depression-among-mothers-in-six-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-postpartum-depression-among-mothers-in-six-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc977bf2-0d81-482c-83a7-3b6140ca17b9 Sun, 19 May 2024 21:40:00 -0400 Study reveals alarming rates of postpartum depression among mothers in six countries
饮食和营养对寻常痤疮的影响研究强调了某些饮食成分（例如乳制品、巧克力和脂肪）在寻常痤疮发生中的重要作用，并强调需要进一步研究以提供有效的饮食建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Diet-and-nutritions-influence-on-acne-vulgaris.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240519/Diet-and-nutritions-influence-on-acne-vulgaris.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb6fb295-1ce5-4b83-93e1-25ff33b40342 Sun, 19 May 2024 21:32:00 -0400 Diet and nutrition's influence on acne vulgaris
研究表明工作记忆如何通过练习提高洛克菲勒大学和加州大学洛杉矶分校研究人员的一项新研究表明，“熟能生巧”不仅仅是陈词滥调。相反，它是掌握一项任务的秘诀，因为一遍又一遍地重复一项活动可以巩固大脑中的神经通路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-shows-how-working-memory-improves-through-practice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-shows-how-working-memory-improves-through-practice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb5fa104-b468-40df-9500-52cc44e20050 Fri, 17 May 2024 17:14:00 -0400 Study shows how working memory improves through practice
对健康挑战和代谢综合征风险因素的新见解今天在《柳叶刀》上发表的 2021 年全球疾病、伤害和风险因素负担研究 (GBD) 的最新发现为健康挑战及其驱动因素提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/New-insights-into-health-challenges-and-the-risk-factors-driven-metabolic-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/New-insights-into-health-challenges-and-the-risk-factors-driven-metabolic-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c539a4e-8380-4c0d-816d-4044786eb579 Fri, 17 May 2024 16:59:00 -0400 New insights into health challenges and the risk factors driving metabolic syndromes
